page.title: 19A Pub Tenant's Day.
page.content: On a week_day Mrs.Parr's typical day at the Greendale Oak Cuckney is:_ 9.00am.Gets up 9.30am.Eats breakfast 9.45_10.30am.Prepares potatoes for making chips 10.30_12.00am.Prepares soup ,vegetables and batter for fish. 12.00_2.00pm.Cooks meals and bar snacks for customers in the pub. 2.00_3.00pm.Has lunch and cleans up kitchen.3.00_3.30pm Deals with letters and bills.3.00_7.00pm.Relaxes in her upstairs rooms watching T.V.or reading the newspaper. 7.00_11.00pm.Starts work in the downstairs kitchen again preparing evening meals and bar snacks. 11.00pm.Checks that the pub is cleared of customers,that all doors are locked and tills are put away. 11.45pm.Goes back upstairs and either goes to bed,watches T.V.,or finishes reading the newspapers.
